$
$
$
Where ya Gonna Party?
/$
/$
$
About Us
$
$
OPEN
Monday-Friday 11am-2:30am
Saturday & Sunday 8am-2:30am
/$
$
Breakfast Served
Saturday &
Sunday at
8am
Kitchen Opens 11am Weekdays
8am Saturday & Sunday
/$
/$
$
Salty Jims is your local "dive bar" where friends come to unwind at the end of a work day, shoot pool, celebrate special occasions and of course, a little Karaoke every once in a while. We offer you our outdoor tiki bar hut, free pool hall tables for paying customers and some darned good food.
Enjoy "live music" weekly on our outside patio, eat great food and make more friends.
/$
$
$
Better than Bar Food!
/$
$
We put together a menu of local favorites for you to enjoy once the munchies kick in!  Some items you expect like great burgers and delicious wings and a few items that our chef wanted to share with you.
​
Let us know what you think!
​
BREAKFAST - SATURDAY AND SUNDAY ONLY Starting at 8am.
/$

$
$
$
$
Band Schedule & Events
/$
$
We have some incredibly talented local bands playing on our stages and fun events scheduled throughout the year.
This is the place to check them out at the beginning of every month!!
/$
/$
$
$
Bands
/$
$
Special Events
/$
$
Pool
/$
$
Bengals
/$
/$
/$
$
$
$
september Music Schedule
/$
$
Salty Jims supports local music and musicians.
The Music Schedule is updated here and our Facebook page.
Bands perform 7pm - 10pm
​
/$
$
/$
$
/$
$
9/ 5
NAY BURZ BAND
Local band, we play it all.. Call us for your next party !
​
9/ 6
SCHMITZ BROTHERS
Classic rock, blues, reggae, traditional country, jazz, funk, bluegrass, fusion, originals....
​
9
/ 12
KARATE IN THE GARAGE
Did we just become best friends? Do you want to do Karate in the Garage? Karate in the Garage just won Best of Venice! Come see us play the Catalina Wine mixer!
​
9
/ 13
JAN GRAY and the COUNTRY ROSE BAND
Real Country Music sung by a true country music legend!
AR!
​
9
/ 19
BLUESTAR
You love the blues, so get ready to groove to the authentic sounds of Bluestar Blues Band! If you're a fan of the legendary Muddy Waters and Howlin Wolf, or The Crusaders and Cannonball Adderley, then you won't want to miss every electrifying live performance!!
9/ 20
DJ PACO
Your feet will be moving when Paco cranks up the vibes!
Bring your friends and make it a night to remember.
​
9/ 26
GRAVEL ROAD BAND
The GRAVEL ROAD is a complete stage experience; mixing song and story to celebrate the Blues, Rock & Soul Music!
​
9
/ 27
MUMBO JUMBO
Virtuosos of gibberish, hogwash, hocus-pocus, and gobbledygook. We are a Sarasota band playing R&B and Americana songs for bars, restaurants, and private  parties.
​
​
​
/$
/$
$
back to the top

Special  Events
/$
$
Our events change out monthly. Keep an eye on this page so you don't miss out on anything. Bring your own bail money!
/$
/$
$
$
/$
$
/$
$
OHIO DRINKING
PARTY
OCTober 24
7pm - 12am
/$
/$

$
Make  Us  YOUR  Bengals  Bar!
/$
$
Serious Bengals fans make SALTY JIMS their official headquarters for the 2025-2026 season!  Welcome to the Sarasota Jungle!!
/$
/$
$
Maybe this year?
/$
$
/$
